name: whatsapp-web-example
description: WhatsApp Web.js com AWS S3 RemoteAuth para múltiplas sessões

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true LOG_LEVEL=debug node api.js
scripts.dev:inspect: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true LOG_LEVEL=debug node --inspect api.js
scripts.dev:break: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true LOG_LEVEL=debug node --inspect-brk api.js
